name: Dhaka
info: Dhaka is the capital and largest city of Bangladesh, known for its vibrant culture, colorful rickshaws, and bustling urban life with over 20 million people.

name: Paris
info: Paris is the capital of France, known as the 'City of Light' and famous for romance, art, fashion, the Eiffel Tower, and world-class museums.

name: Tokyo
info: Tokyo is Japan's capital and one of the world's most populous metropolitan areas, blending ultramodern skyscrapers with traditional temples.

name: New York
info: New York is the largest city in the United States, a global financial hub known for the Statue of Liberty, Times Square, and Broadway.

name: Dubai
info: Dubai is a modern city in the UAE known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture including the Burj Khalifa, and man-made wonders.

name: London
info: London is the capital of the United Kingdom, rich in history with iconic landmarks like Big Ben, Tower Bridge, and Buckingham Palace.

name: Sydney
info: Sydney is Australia's largest city, famous for the Sydney Opera House, Harbor Bridge, beautiful beaches, and laid-back lifestyle.

name: Cairo
info: Cairo is Egypt's capital, one of the world's oldest cities, located near the ancient Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx.

name: Mumbai
info: Mumbai is India's financial capital and home of Bollywood, known for its bustling streets, diverse culture, and coastal location.

name: Singapore
info: Singapore is a modern city-state known for its cleanliness, efficiency, Marina Bay Sands, and being a global financial hub.

name: Istanbul
info: Istanbul straddles two continents, known for its rich history, Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, and being the bridge between East and West.

name: Los Angeles
info: Los Angeles is the entertainment capital of the world, home to Hollywood, beautiful beaches, and year-round sunshine.

name: Seoul
info: Seoul is South Korea's capital, a megacity known for K-pop culture, high-tech infrastructure, palaces, and vibrant nightlife.

name: Rome
info: Rome, the Eternal City, is Italy's capital with over 2,500 years of history, home to the Colosseum, Vatican City, and ancient ruins.

name: Barcelona
info: Barcelona is known for GaudÃ­'s architecture including Sagrada Familia, beautiful beaches, Gothic Quarter, and vibrant culture.
